hero.title: About Win-Win
hero.subtitle: Building careers in sales, one success story at a time

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the leading sales talent partner in Slovenia, recognized for transforming ambitious individuals into top-performing sales professionals.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We provide structured career paths, professional training, and ongoing support to help sales professionals achieve their potential and build rewarding careers in telecommunications and beyond.

values.title: Performance Culture
values.description: We believe in measurable results, clear KPIs, and rewarding high achievers with career growth and financial success.

values.title: Professional Development
values.description: Continuous training, coaching, and mentorship programs designed to develop sales skills and business acumen.

values.title: Team Support
values.description: A collaborative environment where experienced professionals help newcomers succeed through shared knowledge and best practices.

values.title: Transparent Systems
values.description: Clear commission structures, honest expectations, and open communication about performance and opportunities.

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.description: Win-Win is built on a foundation of structured success. We combine proven sales methodologies with modern tools and genuine support to create an environment where talent thrives.

faq.question: What makes Win-Win different from other sales agencies?
faq.answer: We focus on long-term career development, not just short-term placements. Our structured training programs, clear KPI systems, and genuine mentorship help salespeople build sustainable careers with real growth potential.

faq.question: Do you provide training for newcomers to sales?
faq.answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive onboarding including product knowledge, sales scripts, CRM training, and ongoing coaching. Many of our top performers started with no prior sales experience.

faq.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer: We provide CRM tools, proven scripts, back-office support, regular coaching sessions, performance tracking, and a supportive team environment. You're never alone in your sales journey.

faq.question: How is compensation structured?
faq.answer: Our compensation models vary by role but always include performance-based earnings. We offer competitive base salaries or hourly rates plus attractive commission structures with uncapped earning potential.

faq.question: What career progression opportunities exist?
faq.answer: Top performers can advance to senior sales roles, team leadership positions, or specialized B2B consultancy. We promote from within and reward consistent excellence.

faq.question: Do you work with both B2C and B2B clients?
faq.answer: Yes, we operate across multiple channels: field sales (B2C), call center operations (B2C), and business consulting (B2B). This diversity offers varied career paths for different skill sets and preferences.
